keyword: how many calories in 1 teaspoon of honey
title: How Many Calories in 1 Teaspoon of Honey?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in 1 teaspoon of honey, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per serving for better dietary tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in 1 Teaspoon of Honey?
assumptions: Pure, natural honey; standard teaspoon measure (~7 g); no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by honey type (e.g., raw, floral source), brand, and exact measurement. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of honey provides about 21 calories, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Diluted in herbal tea (same honey amount)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 teaspoon of honey?
How much sugar is in a teaspoon of honey?
Does honey have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Negligible—0 g protein and 0 g fat per teaspoon.

faqs.q: Is raw honey lower in calories than processed?
faqs.a: Calories are similar (~21 per tsp); raw may have more nutrients.

faqs.q: How does honey compare to table sugar calories?
faqs.a: Similar density: 1 tsp honey ≈ 21 kcal, 1 tsp sugar ≈ 16 kcal.
